string.name: xChessInsights
string.comment:
xChessInsights
Appears as the tab/window title when viewing a player's insights, for example https://lichess.org/insights/thibault/acpl/variant

resources.string: %s ainda não tem dicas de xadrez!

string.name: insightsAreProtected
string.comment:
insightsAreProtected
This means they will not be displayed to you.

resources.string: As dicas de xadrez de %s estão protegidas
Lamentamos, não pode ver as dicas de xadrez de %s.

string.name: generateInsights
string.comment:
generateInsights
Clicking this will scan data on Lichess to create insights for player %s.

resources.string: Gerar as dicas de xadrez de %s.

string.name: crunchingData
string.comment:
crunchingData
For chess insights, when you ask to create a new set of chess insights based on your/another player's game history.

resources.string: A processar dados só para si!

string.name: maybeAskThemToChangeTheir
string.comment:
maybeAskThemToChangeTheir %s is the translation for 'insights settings'.
Your settings control privacy for your chess insights, and determine who can and cannot see them.

resources.string: Poderá talvez pedir-lhes que mudem as respetivas %s?

string.name: insightsSettings
string.comment: insightsSettings In the context of 'Maybe ask them to change their insight settings?' - separate string available for translation.
